name: critical
description: A very high priority issue that needs immediate attention

name: development
description: Contributes to the development of the thesis software

name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: epic
description: Large issue that encompasses multiple issues

name: refactor
description: Improve or optimize existing code without changing its functionality

name: validation
description: Related to testing and validating solutions

name: wont do/fix
description: This will not be worked on
